name: radio-node
description: simple app to demonstrate usage of joynr

scripts.startconsumer: domain=$npm_package_config_domain runtime=$npm_package_config_runtime wshost=$npm_package_config_ws_host wsport=$npm_package_config_ws_port udspath=$npm_package_config_uds_path udsclientid=$npm_package_config_uds_consumerid udsconnectsleeptimems=$npm_package_config_uds_connectsleeptimems bounceProxyBaseUrl=$npm_package_config_bounceProxyBaseUrl brokerUri=$npm_package_config_brokerUri ts-node src/main/js/radioConsumer
scripts.startprovider: domain=$npm_package_config_domain runtime=$npm_package_config_runtime wshost=$npm_package_config_ws_host wsport=$npm_package_config_ws_port udspath=$npm_package_config_uds_path udsclientid=$npm_package_config_uds_providerid udsconnectsleeptimems=$npm_package_config_uds_connectsleeptimems bounceProxyBaseUrl=$npm_package_config_bounceProxyBaseUrl brokerUri=$npm_package_config_brokerUri ts-node src/main/js/radioProvider
scripts.format:install: npm i prettier@1.17.1 --no-save && npm run format
